message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1,200,000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900,000. I'm willing to negotiate further to reach a mutually beneficial price.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $1,200,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. I believe this price reflects a fair balance.
I'm still not convinced that $1,050,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950,000. I think that's a fair price for the product.
